statements: SELECT * FROM aquaculture_maintenance;
SELECT facility_name, maintenance_type FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_id, facility_name, maintenance_type FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE facility_name LIKE '%Farm%';
SELECT facility_name, repair_description FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT maintenance_id, facility_name, maintenance_type, repair_description, scheduled_date, completion_date FROM aquaculture_maintenance;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance';
SELECT facility_name, maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM aquaculture_maintenance WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, scheduled_date, completion_date FROM aquaculture_maintenance ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 10
SELECT * FROM repairs WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_date ASC
SELECT repair_type, repair_cost FROM repairs WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND equipment_id = 200;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id IN (100, 200, 300) ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_date, equipment_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM repairs WHERE repair_cost > 500.00 ORDER BY repair_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure;
SELECT name, location FROM infrastructure;
SELECT id, name, last_maintenance_date FROM infrastructure ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT infrastructure.name, repair_history.repair_date, repair_history.repair_description FROM infrastructure JOIN repair_history ON infrastructure.id = repair_history.infrastructure_id;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM infrastructure ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT infrastructure.name, repair_history.repair_description FROM infrastructure JOIN repair_history ON infrastructure.id = repair_history.infrastructure_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM infrastructure WHERE last_maintenance_date < CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE infrastructure_id = 101;
SELECT infrastructure_id, location FROM Infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type = 'Building';
SELECT repair_id, repair_description, repair_cost FROM Repairs WHERE repair_cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_completed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_maintenance FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE infrastructure_id = 100;
SELECT infrastructure_id, location FROM Infrastructure WHERE infrastructure_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT repair_id, repair_description, repair_cost FROM Repairs WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, schedule_id, repair_id FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_completed_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM asset WHERE asset_type = 'Printer';
SELECT repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair WHERE repair_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(asset_id) AS total_assets FROM asset;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM asset WHERE location LIKE '%Office%' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT repair_date, repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_date ASC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, location FROM asset WHERE asset_type='Machine' AND location LIKE '%Floor%';
SELECT log_id, asset_id, maintenance_date, completed FROM maintenance_log WHERE completed=TRUE ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
